H0.text: Inherited disorder is the type of disorder that Tay‑Sachs disease is.

H1.text: Vitamin difficiency is the kind of disorder that Tay‑Sachs disease is.

H2.text: A type of cancer is the kind of disorder that Tay‑Sachs disease is.

H3.text: Accumulated disease is the type of disorder that Tay‑Sachs disease is.

A4.text: Tay–Sachs disease is an autosomal recessive genetic disorder

A5.text: Tay–Sachs disease is an inherited fatal lysosomal storage disease
